verses.verse: Ho <S%H1945><s%>, every one that thirsteth <S%H6771><s%>, come <S%H3212><s%> ye to the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and he that hath no money <S%H3701><s%>; come <S%H3212><s%> ye, buy <S%H7666><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%>; yea, come <S%H3212><s%>, buy <S%H7666><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> and milk <S%H2461><s%> without money <S%H3701><s%> and without price <S%H4242><s%>.

Wherefore do ye spend <S%H8254><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> for that which is not bread <S%H3899><s%>? and your labour <S%H3018><s%> for that which satisfieth <S%H7654><s%> not <S%H3808><s%>? hearken <S%H8085><s%> diligently <S%H8085><s%> unto me, and eat <S%H398><s%> ye that which is good <S%H2896><s%>, and let your soul <S%H5315><s%> delight <S%H6026><s%> itself in fatness <S%H1880><s%>. spend: Heb. weigh

Incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%>, and come <S%H3212><s%> unto me: hear <S%H8085><s%>, and your soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%>; and I will make <S%H3772><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, even the sure <S%H539><s%> mercies <S%H2617><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>.
Behold, I have given <S%H5414><s%> him for a witness <S%H5707><s%> to the people <S%H3816><s%>, a leader <S%H5057><s%> and commander <S%H6680><s%> to the people <S%H3816><s%>.

Behold, thou shalt call <S%H7121><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> that thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not, and nations <S%H1471><s%> that knew <S%H3045><s%> not thee shall run <S%H7323><s%> unto thee because of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and for the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; for he hath glorified <S%H6286><s%> thee.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3068><s%> while he may be found <S%H4672><s%>, call <S%H7121><s%> ye upon him while he is near <S%H7138><s%>:

Let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>, and the unrighteous <S%H205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his thoughts <S%H4284><s%>: and let him return <S%H7725><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and he will have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon him; and to our God <S%H430><s%>, for he will abundantly <S%H7235><s%> pardon <S%H5545><s%>. the unrighteous: Heb. the man of iniquity abundantly: Heb. multiply to pardon
For my thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are not your thoughts <S%H4284><s%>, neither are your ways <S%H1870><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

For as the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are higher <S%H1361><s%> than the earth <S%H776><s%>, so are my ways <S%H1870><s%> higher <S%H1361><s%> than your ways <S%H1870><s%>, and my thoughts <S%H4284><s%> than your thoughts <S%H4284><s%>.

For as the rain <S%H1653><s%> cometh down <S%H3381><s%>, and the snow <S%H7950><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and returneth <S%H7725><s%> not thither, but watereth <S%H7301><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and maketh it bring forth <S%H3205><s%> and bud <S%H6779><s%>, that it may give <S%H5414><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> to the sower <S%H2232><s%>, and bread <S%H3899><s%> to the eater <S%H398><s%>:

So shall my word <S%H1697><s%> be that goeth forth <S%H3318><s%> out of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>: it shall not return <S%H7725><s%> unto me void <S%H7387><s%>, but it shall accomplish <S%H6213><s%> that which I please <S%H2654><s%>, and it shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> in the thing whereto I sent <S%H7971><s%> it.

For ye shall go out <S%H3318><s%> with joy <S%H8057><s%>, and be led forth <S%H2986><s%> with peace <S%H7965><s%>: the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and the hills <S%H1389><s%> shall break forth <S%H6476><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you into singing <S%H7440><s%>, and all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall clap <S%H4222><s%> their hands <S%H3709><s%>.

Instead of the thorn <S%H5285><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> the fir tree <S%H1265><s%>, and instead of the brier <S%H5636><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> the myrtle tree <S%H1918><s%>: and it shall be to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a name <S%H8034><s%>, for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> sign <S%H226><s%> that shall not be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.
